text: Christopher Hudson (born 1 August 1900, date of death unknown) was a British alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:Year of death missing Category:British male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Great Britain Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Christopher Hudson (alpine skier)
